title: Aadhya Kundan and Gemstone Haaram - Timeless Elegance
materials: High-Quality Kundan setting with meticulously placed Rubies and Emeralds. Set in a detailed Hyderabadi polished frame for extra luster.
features: Intricate Kundan setting with traditional floral motifs. Graduating design with alternating rubies and emeralds. The pendant features a central emerald surrounded by rubies and diamonds, culminating in delicate gold bead hangings. A combination of antique and modern design elements creates a striking piece.
occasions: and traditional South Indian functions like Muhurtham
and half-saree functions. Also a statement piece for formal events and grand celebrations.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing traditional Kundan artistry blended with modern sensibilities. The harmonious combination of rubies, emeralds, and diamonds creates a captivating and regal aesthetic. A timeless heirloom that embodies South Indian cultural heritage and represents enduring elegance.
